title: Khloe Skips Kim Kardashian's Birthday Bash to Be With Lamar Odom
text:
Comments A source close to Lamar has been quoted as claiming the former NBA star 'can't stand up by himself' and Khloe 'is still very worried about him.' 
The Kardashians and Jenner clans have all gathered to help Kim Kardashian celebrating her 35th birthday on a surprise party threw by husband Kanye West on Wednesday, October 21. One person notably absent was Khloe Kardashian who preferred to skip the bash to be by her estranged husband Lamar Odom 's side as he recuperates. "Lamar isn't doing that well," a source told Us Weekly of 35-year-old Lamar. "He can't stand up by himself. She is still very worried about him and uncomfortable with leaving." While the source hasn't offered further details of Lamar's current health condition, another source close to the athlete informed PEOPLE that the former NBA star "is still on dialysis and has trouble standing on his own." "Lamar is doing okay. There are still many questions about what will happen in the future," revealed the source. "Lamar still can't stand up alone. He has to be helped to a chair right by his bed. He is receiving antibiotics for a respiratory infection. He is also still receiving dialysis." Lamar was transferred via helicopter from Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas to Cedars-Sinai Hospital in L.A. on Monday, October 19. He remained unconscious for nearly 72 hours after being found unconscious last Tuesday, Oct. 13, at the Love Ranch South, a legal brothel in Pahrump, Nev. The former NBA star finally opened his eyes on Friday, October 16.
